Hello! My name is Tommy.
I am a third year computer science major at Georgia Tech who's passionate about software development and the application of algorithms. Here is what I am currently working on:
  • Outside of class, I work as a software developer on the Apiary automated malware intelligence system at the Georgia Tech Research Institute.
  • I am working to publish a paper on my research in using optimization algorithms to determine key parameters in Bathymetric LiDAR data collection.
  • I lead the software team for a student ran research class, working to create an autonomously driving vehicle.
  • I am exploring my interests in cooking, weightlifting and 3d printing!
